answers.answer: You haven't actually asked any question, but I'm assuming you realize those numbers are too high. I'm not sure what you mean by "my latest report". Do you test your blood sugar on a daily basis? If those numbers are your usual, you need to talk to your doctor as your medication is obviously not working. Are you using diet and exercise as well to help control your glucose?

question: my latest report gives 154dl morning fasting & 201dl after 2 hours of lunch. i take glynase 2.5mg morning & 2.5mg evening every day.This discussion is related to/posts/show/720106.
title: controllig diabetes
